title: Spider-Man/Black Cat : The Evil That Men Do
description: The mysterious disappearance of an old friend brings Felicia Hardy, the Black Cat, to New York in search of answers, and a certain web-slinging ex-lover of hers is following the same trail. How long will it take before they do some... catching up? Collects Spider-Man/Black Cat: The Evil That Men Do #1-6.
author: Kevin  Smith
